message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 10% and keeping 90% for myself.  You can accept or we can keep playing, but remember, each round lessens the value of the money!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Time is running out and the value is decreasing!
I'm willing to negotiate, Bob, but I'm not giving up a majority share.  Let's split it 70/30. This is my final offer before the money keeps losing value!
Alice, you're right about the shrinking pot.  My final offer is a 55/45 split.  Let's end this before we both lose out!
